Medford.Fresh Pond Hotel:
The Fresh Pond Hotel is an historic former hotel at 234 Lakeview Avenue in Cambridge, Massachusetts.


== History ==
The three story wood frame hotel was built in 1796 by Jacob Wyeth. Jacob was a graduate of Harvard, Class of 1792, and on 20 Sept 1796 he bought 8 acres (32,000 m2) from his father, bordering on Fresh Pond, and erected the "Fresh Pond Hotel", which was a popular resort.
